action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I am starting with "table," a common five-letter English word that uses frequently occurring letters.
guess: table

attempts = 1
target_word = pasta
guess = table
guess_feedback = t<yellow> a<green> b<red> l<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: t<yellow> a<green> b<red> l<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "a" is correct and in the second position. "t" is in the word but not in the first position. "b", "l", and "e" are not in the word. I will try "stamp" to keep "a" in the second position, move "t" to a new spot, and use new letters.
guess: stamp

attempts = 2
target_word = pasta
guess = stamp
guess_feedback = s<yellow> t<yellow> a<yellow> m<red> p<yellow>

guess_feedback: s<yellow> t<yellow> a<yellow> m<red> p<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: All letters except "m" are present but in the wrong positions. "a" should not be in the second position, "t" not in the second, "s" not in the first, and "p" not in the fifth. I will try "pants" to rearrange the known letters.
guess: pants

attempts = 3
target_word = pasta
guess = pants
guess_feedback = p<green> a<green> n<red> t<green> s<yellow>

guess_feedback: p<green> a<green> n<red> t<green> s<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "p", "a", and "t" are correct and in the right positions (1st, 2nd, 4th). "s" is in the word but not in the 5th position. "n" is not in the word. I will try "paste" to keep "p", "a", "t" in place and move "s" to a new position.
guess: paste

attempts = 4
target_word = pasta
guess = paste
guess_feedback = p<green> a<green> s<green> t<green> e<red>

guess_feedback: p<green> a<green> s<green> t<green> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "p", "a", "s", and "t" are correct and in the right positions (1st to 4th). "e" is not in the word. I will try "pasty" as it fits all the clues and uses a new letter in the fifth position.
guess: pasty

attempts = 5
target_word = pasta
guess = pasty
guess_feedback = p<green> a<green> s<green> t<green> y<red>

guess_feedback: p<green> a<green> s<green> t<green> y<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "p", "a", "s", and "t" are correct and in the right positions. "y" is not in the word. I will try "pasts" as it fits all clues and uses a new letter in the fifth position.
guess: pasts

attempts = 6
target_word = pasta
guess = pasts
guess_feedback = p<green> a<green> s<green> t<green> s<red>

guess_explanation: I am starting with "table," a common five-letter English word that uses frequently occurring letters.

The letter "a" is correct and in the second position. "t" is in the word but not in the first position. "b", "l", and "e" are not in the word. I will try "stamp" to keep "a" in the second position, move "t" to a new spot, and use new letters.

All letters except "m" are present but in the wrong positions. "a" should not be in the second position, "t" not in the second, "s" not in the first, and "p" not in the fifth. I will try "pants" to rearrange the known letters.

"p", "a", and "t" are correct and in the right positions (1st, 2nd, 4th). "s" is in the word but not in the 5th position. "n" is not in the word. I will try "paste" to keep "p", "a", "t" in place and move "s" to a new position.
"p", "a", "s", and "t" are correct and in the right positions (1st to 4th). "e" is not in the word. I will try "pasty" as it fits all the clues and uses a new letter in the fifth position.
"p", "a", "s", and "t" are correct and in the right positions. "y" is not in the word. I will try "pasts" as it fits all clues and uses a new letter in the fifth position.
